Up | 3–6 months | Regime A: anchored inflation with a data‑dependent easing path that drifts the discount rate lower, supporting valuations for long‑duration cash flows including ETH/BTC as ETF inflows, staking yields, and corporate treasury activity feed a secular bid (OGK8WLL69) | Watch ETH near 4,955, BTC near 124,496, ETH staking ≈ 33%, and stablecoins ≈ 40% of blockchain fees, with regulatory clarity expanding institutional participation (OGK8WLL69) | 50% (T1QE6JPIX)(J99EM2TPZ)
Up | 6–12 months | AI productivity/tech uplift: a stronger‑than‑expected AI‑driven productivity impulse lowers inflation, lifts private‑market participation, and accelerates adoption of Pacaso to roughly 10 destinations and Range milestones, potentially reweighting tech/private‑market flows toward crypto infrastructure (UPV3X2MQ6) | Watch concrete Pacaso expansion timetable to 10 destinations and Range adoption/asset‑growth signals (UPV3X2MQ6) | 5–10% (UPV3X2MQ6)
